original_title: Old Anandians annual blood donation campaign on Saturday
original_body_lines: In memory of the Founders of Ananda College, the Old Anandians’ 70-75 Group with the voluntary participation of the Old Anandians’ 2013 Group, both of which are affiliated to the Ananda College Old Boys’ Association has organised a Blood Donation Campaign for the 25th time, with the collaboration of the Colombo North Teaching Hospital Ragama, on Saturday, 18 November from 8.00 am to 2.00 pm at the College premises.

The Old Anandians also solicit the participation of the public who are in the vicinity of Ananda College premises to join in this meritorious deed. Participation by those interested at this meritorious program will undoubtedly save many lives.
